name: Blackhole Blasters
description:
MADE IN A WEEK FOR BRACKEYS GAME JAM #3

A physics-based local multiplayer game where everyone has black hole launchers and tries to kill each other.

IMPORTANT INFO

Supports both keyboard and controllers. Tested with PlayStation and Xbox controllers.

You can play with up to 4 players total, with 4 controllers or 3 controllers and 1 keyboard.

Please note: Currently the game has issues detecting controllers sometimes, try refreshing the game if you have problems.

CONTROLS

Controller - Left stick for movement, right stick for aiming, RT to shoot, LT to remove last black hole shot.

Keyboard - WASD for movement, mouse for aiming, L-Click to shoot, R-Click to remove last black hole shot.

It is recommended to play in-game tutorial.
